	Flutter Android app with authentication, product listing, and new product creation with camera/barcode scanner.

	Created Flutter project structure with all necessary files.

	Added authentication, product screens, camera, barcode scanner functionality.

	Flutter and Dart extensions recommended for VS Code.

- [x] Compile the Project
	Dependencies installed successfully with flutter pub get.

- [ ] Create and Run Task
	Create tasks.json for Flutter run.

- [ ] Launch the Project
	Launch app in debug mode.
